scripts.types:gen: npm run types:gen:db && npm run types:gen:client && npm run types:gen:admin && npm run types:gen:functions
scripts.types:gen:db: npx supabase gen types typescript --schema public > ./supabase/types/supabase.ts --local
scripts.types:gen:functions: npx supabase gen types typescript --schema public > ./supabase/functions/_shared/supabase.ts --local
scripts.types:gen:client: npx supabase gen types typescript --schema public > ../client/src/types/supabase.ts --local
scripts.types:gen:admin: npx supabase gen types typescript --schema public > ../admin/src/types/supabase.ts --local
scripts.save:dump:local: npm run save:seed:local && npm run save:role:local && npm run remove_users
scripts.save:dump:prod: npm run save:seed:prod && npm run save:role:prod && npm run remove_users
